Mystic_Shot.help: This magic attuned rifle shoots concentrated bursts of magical energy, causing energy damage and reducing your target's defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Mystic_Barrage.help: You have learned to effectively combine your rifle's rapid fire barrage attack with the magical training of the Carnival. This deals energy damage and reduces your target's defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Mystic_Smash.help: You retain much of your Resistance armor, even as you learn magic from the Carnival. Your armor's energy punch is now powered by mystic energy, causing energy and smashing damage on impact. There is also a chance that you may stun your target.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Mystic_Burst.help: Trained by the Carnival mistresses, you have learned how to mimic their Radiance attack, causing energy damage to foes caught in the energy burst and potentially confusing them.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Mystic_Suppression.help: You have learned to effectively combine your rifle's suppressive burst fire attack with the magical training of the Carnival, allowing for you to suppress the ability of your foes to attack you. This attack causes energy damage. Affected targets also suffer reductions in their chance to hit and both movement and attack speeds.
Mystic_Suppression.targetHelp: Your chance to hit, as well as your attack and movement speed have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
You lose {Damage} points of endurance due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Single_Shot.help: You are able to switch off the magical attunement of your rifle at will, allowing you to fire a traditional plasma burst that lowers your target's regeneration.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Heavy_Burst.help: You switch off the magical attunement of your rifle, allowing you to fire a series of rapid traditional plasma bursts. This causes energy damage to several targets in a cone in front of you and reduces their recovery.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Covering_Fire.help: You switch off the magical attunement of your rifle, firing a spray of plasma bursts meant to suppress action by your foes. Affected target suffer energy damage and a reduced chance to hit, due to the amount of energy flying around.
Covering_Fire.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
